Reckless Fury.name: Reckless Fury
Reckless Fury.flavor: Friend and foe alike must flee to escape your wild rage and whirling weapons.
Reckless Fury.onHit: 2[W] + ability modifier damage. If the target ends its next turn adjacent to you, it provokes an opportunity attack from you.
Reckless Fury.effect: You grant combat advantage until the start of your next turn.

Reaving Brutality.name: Reaving Brutality
Reaving Brutality.flavor: Your brutal attack leaves the enemy with a difficult choiceâ€”stand and fight, or flee the battlefield.
Reaving Brutality.onHit: 4[W] + ability modifier damage, and the target cannot shift (save ends).
Reaving Brutality.onMiss: Half damage, and the target cannot shift until the end of your next turn.
Reaving Brutality.effect: If the target is bloodied but still conscious after you use this power, you can spend a healing surge as a free action.

Bloody Harvest.name: Bloody Harvest
Bloody Harvest.flavor: Each foe you drop adds power to your destructive melee attacks.
Bloody Harvest.effect: You assume the bloody harvest stance. Until the stance ends, each time you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points with a melee weapon attack, you gain a bonus to the next damage roll you make with a melee weapon attack before the end of your next turn. The bonus equals your primary ability modifier.
